mapper.select: select c.id,c.name from tb_column c where c.parentId is null order by c.priority desc,c.id desc
select c from tb_column c where c.code = #{code}
select c.id,c.name from tb_column c where c.parentId = #{pId} order by c.priority desc,c.id desc
update tb_column c set c.type = #{type},c.hasNeedForm = #{hasNeedForm} where c.id = #{id} or c.parentId = #{id}
select * from tb_column c where id=#{id}
select count(*) from tb_column where code=#{code}
select * from tb_column order by c.priority desc,c.id desc
select count(*) from tb_column where name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or code like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or enName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select * from tb_column where name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or code like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or enName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by priority desc,id desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
